thread.title: Watch Jonny Gomes take out a kid while celebrating the Royals’ ALCS berth - Baseball
thread.title_full: Watch Jonny Gomes take out a kid while celebrating the Royals’ ALCS berth - Baseball

author: Gary Dzen
title: Watch Jonny Gomes take out a kid while celebrating the Royals’ ALCS berth - Baseball
text:
Jonny Gomes celebrated Wednesday night’s Kansas City Royals win over the Texas Rangers like any father would do, twirling his daughter round and round on the pitcher’s mound. That’a all fine and good until another, smaller kid comes into the frame.
"Hacksaw" Jonny Gomes celebrates last night by accidentally knocking out a toddler. https://t.co/DcfTuzkhBE
— Toucher and Rich (@Toucherandrich) October 15, 2015 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Antother clip below shows the kid getting up.
Okay Royals might wanna slow down on the celebration just a tad #mlb #royals #poorkid #playoffs #mlbplayoffs #mlbgames #baseball #baseballcards #kc #alds #alcs #bloopers
A video posted by Rich Liberto (@richiel1991) on Oct 14, 2015 at 8:21pm PDT
h/t Deadspin
